mean_cn: v. 选举，表决，投票；  n. 投票（过程），投票权，选票
mean_en: to make an official choice for or against someone or something by casting a ballot, raising your hand, speaking your choice aloud, etc.
word_etyma: vot发誓+e→投票前需要发誓以示诚实→投票
sentence: I was forced to vote for one of them as Miss Countryside.
sentence_trans: 我被迫从这两位中间选出村花。
